external_games.name: Numb: Just Don't Think About It
Numb - Just don't think about it

name: Numb: Just Don't Think About It
storyline:
Walk in the shoes of B - a character defined only by their namelessness. Ageless, genderless, and devoid of backstory, B navigates life within the stifling confines of a seemingly ordinary apartment building.

But this building shrouds a grim secret. An ordinary day spirals into horror when B stumbles upon an unimaginable scene. Residents, once alive with stories and secrets, lie lifeless. The building, once mundane, twists into a labyrinth of fear. As B, you are left grappling with the unknown. What happened in this building? And more importantly, what's yet to happen?
summary: Numb - Just Don't Think About It plunges you into an unsettling 2D horror experience where your sanity is your only lifeline.
